title: "Artist Brendan Dawes to Offer NFT Art Inspired by ‘AI 2041’ on TR Lab"
excerpt: "But it’s the topic that grabbed the attention of digital artist Brendan Dawes, who on Monday released a mesmerizing 25-second video loop titled Unique Services for your Happiness.  Dawes’ generative artwork—created through computer code he developed to cull impressions of how people express happiness on social media—will be auctioned as an nonfungible token at 10 a."
